messageBody:
Quoting "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...>:

> murukeshcts wrote:
>
> > hai all,
> > Is there any tool available..that i can integrated with WSAD so that
> > i can check for the code coverage of the JUnitcode which a person
> > writes in his project.
>
> I don't know about WSAD integration, but there are several test coverage
> tools out there, including Clover and Jester. They are easily integrated
> with Ant.

jcoverage <http://www.jcoverage.com> works nicely too

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Ritz Bossicard
